author: mariadalfonso
body:
this modifier run2_nanoAOD_devel can be used to protect ongoing production.
i.e. the one using the run2_nanoAOD_106Xv1 
in this PR I correct the PPS recently added

All new nano features in 10_6 can be added like:
(run2_nanoAOD_106Xv1 and ~run2_nanoAOD_devel).toModify(xyzTable , xyxVariable = None)

+ replace pilot as already done in 11_2 and 11_3
title: Modifier for v8nano
